website_summaries.verdict: Latex-free gloves that are thin enough to be comfortable but are still durable.
pros: Durable enough to resist most tears
More comfortable than latex and vinyl
cons: Some found them to break too easy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use around the house when painting, potting plants, cleaning and other chores that ordinarily result in dirty hands. So far, I've found them to be excellent for my purposes - perhaps a bit more than I actually require, but excellent, and I plan to continue to use these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the price but I found them to tear easy. They don't seem to hold up well. I'm still recommending them since the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: patricia brooks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered large. I'm 6' so no tiny. They fit my hands perfectly. I use them for acrylic paint pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Keeler

customer_reviews.title: They are not cheap junk. Good quality .
customer_reviews.text: This product is used by two care providers for seniors. They are a good fit and they are easy to work with. I recommend them. I use them when I need to clean up at the home and the office.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Martine

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find large size
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed - Large nitrile gloves! Use these a lot in working around house and cooking. Most places only have one-size-fits-all now but they are too tight!
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Toth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These was perfect! I would buy again worked out perfect for the job at hand.. just as described.
customer_reviews.author: princess

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered nitrile gloves as they may be more chemical resistant than latex as I use them some in my shop. I did order large so that they are easy to put on. I use them to put on my leg compression stocking to keep finger nails from tearing the stockings. Works very well and I can use them over and over. The latex gloves I had been using tore easily and were so small that I had to powder my hands to get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where you guys have been, and why we have never purchased from you.....however we have never purchased any Safe Guard products before. The gloves are excellent and very durably constructed. Amazing sensitivity. We at TresMonet labs are very pleased. Will purchase in the future. Dr. LaRive Lead Scientist TresMonet Skincare.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Patrick LaRive

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product & Service
customer_reviews.text: Great product, excellent value, quick delivery -- I also like the box that holds the gloves once opened, providing a good dispenser. I'd purchase from this seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Martha

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought these. Use them when shopping and pumping gas.
customer_reviews.author: LJH

customer_reviews.title: Odor
customer_reviews.text: They seem to have an odor. I will probably do a different Brad next time because it’s just strange.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: They are great for my use!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what is was looking for!!! My use is mainly for handling food and they fit and feel great!!

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the fit. Plus added bonus being latex and powder free.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I need for my work and  running errands needs
customer_reviews.text: Great value and quality product. There is a lot of gloves in one box. I take 3 pairs on each trip outside. I am reordering. It took long to arrive but it is worth it compared to how high the prices are by most of our local distributors.

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are very well made and the price is right..

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: Run a little big. I wear large and just a little sloppy.

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time and were exactly what I needed for my as part of my medkit

customer_reviews.text: The gloves are fine, however I ordered medium and Received large. Same quality gloves are cheaper at Walmart, however sold out.

customer_reviews.title: Fits well

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these gloves

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality. I recommend and will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonably priced product, excellent quality. I recommend and will purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! They fit true to size and are ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! They fit true to size and are very sturdy. I like that they are thin but still hold up perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Fit for profit
customer_reviews.text: There are several things I like about these gloves. They are easy to apply. They fit properly and they are durable. These gloves do not rip when applying them thus making them cost effective.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but has a smell
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are of good quality and didn’t tear while putting them on like some gloves do. They do have a moderately strong rubbery smell though.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit well and hold up well (they don't rip easily). They arrived on time too! Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: good fit, durable.no imperfect gloves
customer_reviews.text: Have not found any imperfect gloves, wear while cleaning bathroom etc, washing dishes, and wear outdoors while handling bird feeders and handling trash. Will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great; easy on and off...even with reuse. Perfect for my purposes.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are very thin and have a very bad smell.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly not surprised
customer_reviews.text: Good quality & exactly what I was expecting. I don’t like surprises and I wasn’t.

customer_reviews.title: The gloves are fine. However
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are fine. However, purchased these when I ran out of Cardinal Health Textured Positive Touch powder free latex exam gloves - size Medium. Their size medium was larger than your size large. Will try extra large next time.

customer_reviews.title: Very please
customer_reviews.text: Our caregiver was very pleased with these gloves and wants us to order them again

customer_reviews.title: I like these, but purchased before the COVID. Husband dislikes them.
customer_reviews.text: I would like to purchase these again for use when shopping, but now I cannot find the right size and now they are way too expensive. I think it should be against the law for the manufacturers of gloves to exploit the current crisis to make money, but since all the gloves seem to be made in China now, it's the USA's fault for being stupid and allowing that. My husband does not like them because they can't stand up to his work as a letter carrier.
customer_reviews.author: MomLovesOnlineShopping

customer_reviews.title: A basic glove
customer_reviews.text: These were not the most comfortable or durable gloves. In fact, I would be hard pressed to try and wear these for more than a few hours without replacement.
customer_reviews.author: S. B. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily
customer_reviews.text: Thought they were more durable but they seem to rip easy. News for lightweight chores only
customer_reviews.author: Alex A.

customer_reviews.title: Good price and fits fine
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are as described. Reviews of other brands warned that sometimes they come all stuck together and won't separate. This brand was fine. They came very quickly. I would buy these again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Shiffrin

customer_reviews.title: Add grip and cleanliness to weak, aging hands
customer_reviews.text: As a senior citizen, dry skin make it difficult to grip objects to open or hang onto, these keep my hands clean and easier to hold onto small, slippery objects

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to protect hands!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent way to protect hands! I have found the perfect glove for me. I use it doing dishes, eating messy finger food and doing general clean up that could damage my skin. I've yet to find a better glove for the ways I use these.

customer_reviews.title: Quality gloves

customer_reviews.title: Not skin tight but do the job.

customer_reviews.title: disposable gloves
customer_reviews.text: Use to color hair and in this virus impact to guard against virus.

customer_reviews.title: Gloves that fit
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves! They fit tight and are easy to put on. I definitely recommend these gloves and I will purchase again in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Glove safety
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Tell everyone if you touch your face with glove WHO said you can get bacteria. Use once and throw ! Great for getting gas and not touching pump. Remember:- Don’t touch face with gloves .

customer_reviews.title: Useful.
customer_reviews.text: I should have order the x large size, after years or construction work my paws are bigger.🤣

customer_reviews.title: Powder and Latex Free Exam Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves so far are working out great for our Church Nursery!

customer_reviews.title: Alll good!
customer_reviews.text: Although I don't use the gloves myself, my personal care attendants do and I have not heard any complaints (and I would if there were problems). They all seem to like them. I'm happy that they were delivered quickly and in good shape as promised. I just started purchasing this brand of glove for my attendants to use and so far, so good. I hope this remains to be the case. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: They are lightweight but sturdy. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: We have had no problem with these gloves. We use them for those delivering personal care to a patient. They are lightweight but sturdy. Thanks.

product_meta.title: SAFEGUARD Nitrile Exam Gloves, Powder Free, Medical Grade Gloves, Latex Free, 100 Pc. Dispenser Pack, Large Size in Blue
product_meta.description: Safeguard Nitrile Gloves Nitrile powder free medical grade gloves are ideal gloves to use for medical and food use to help maintain a safe barrier. Nitrile exam gloves are the ideal solution for individuals sensitive to rubber latex and/or donning powder. They contain no allergy causing natural rubber proteins. Nitrile features extraordinary strength and puncture resistance while maintaining tactile sensitivity. Nitrile “breathes” better than vinyl and latex making it more comfortable to wear over long periods. Nitrile is latex free, non-allergenic and non-irritating. It is the perfect choice for demanding applications involving abrasives, sharp objects, solvents and most chemicals. Nitrile is the material of choice for use in the medical, auto industry, law enforcement tattoo industry, as well as gardening, hair coloring and all household use. Around the home, nitrile gloves can be used indoors or outdoors, in the kitchen or garage for lawn equipment repair, cleaning, personal care, painting, arts and crafts. Nitrile does not tear as easily as vinyl and feels more natural than both latex or vinyl. Meets or exceeds ASTM and FDA examination glove standards. What some of our customers are saying about our Nitrile Gloves ""I work in a hospital and have worn tens of thousands of pairs of glove in the past 25 years. And I can say that these gloves are most certainly hospital quality."" Pat T.
feature_bullets: 100% SAFE: Allergen free, meets or exceeds ASTM and FDA examination glove standards
PREMIUM QUALITY: Extremely durable and puncture resistance, highly elastic and more comfortable than latex and vinyl
SUPERIOR TO LATEX: The ideal solution for individuals sensitive to natural rubber latex and donning powder
AMBDEXIROUS: Fits right or left hand, Textured fingers for improved grip. Palm and fingers are contoured which provides a snug and secure fit
LARGE DISPENSER PACK: 100 gloves per box
